feed.title: Obtainium Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.55
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Create ar.json by @Hussain96o in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2303
  • Rewrite APKPure Source to use the mobile API instead of web scraping by @bernikr in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2305

New Contributors

  • @Hussain96o made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2303

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.54...v1.1.55

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.56
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update hu.json by @summoner001 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2308
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2327
  • Better error message for file deletion failures (#2298)
  • Experiment with smarter version detection (#2324)
  • Support Debian-style standard versions (#2314)
  • Minor UI tweak (pseudo-version in italics on apps page instead of readout)
  • Search should not select any sources by default
  • Update Android-side Gradle + upgrade to Java 21 + upgrade Flutter packages where possible

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.55...v1.1.56

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.57
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Format json file also when exporting selected apps by @lagodimos in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2329
  • Update Catalan Translation by @Cambrells in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2328
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2350
  • Minor wording changes (#2226, #2313, #2317, #2338)
  • HTML bugfix: Incorrect URL resolution on redirected pages (#2315)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.56...v1.1.57

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.58
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix versionCode issue for universal builds (#2352) by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2357
  • This required a new version release since updating the APK on an existing release may have caused problems with the F-Droid variant being picked up.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.57...v1.1.58

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update Russian translation by @solokot in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2360
  • Update/Add German by @DwainZwerg in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2370
  • Create ml.json by @leywino in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2368
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2387
  • Added the option to run background updates in a "foreground" service (more reliable, more power drain)
  • Fix unsupported protocol error for some sources (#2385)
  • Make downgrade detection message more clear (#2342)
  • Make some English strings sentence case (#2338)
  • More logs to troubleshoot BG task (#1550)

New Contributors

  • @solokot made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2360
  • @leywino made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2368

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.58...v1.2.0
